front.title: Centralized Conferencing (XCON) Using the Message Session Relay Protocol (MSRP)

abstract.t: The document "A Framework and Data Model for Centralized Conferencing" defines a centralized conference as both signaling and protocol agnostic. The primary examples within this framework focus on audio and video as the media types for the session. This document defines the mechanisms, in the context of this centralized conferencing framework, when using the Message Session Relay Protocol (MSRP) for instant messaging sessions.
